mapper.select: SELECT d.discount_code AS discount_code, d.member_id AS member_id, m.member_name AS m_name, d.ac_code AS ac_code, d.discount_cate AS discount_cate, d.discount_content AS discount_content, d.discount_date AS discount_date FROM discount d INNER JOIN member m ON d.member_id = m.member_id
SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(discount_code, 9) AS DECIMAL)) FROM discount
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discount ( discount_code, member_id, ac_code, discount_cate, discount_content, discount_date ) VALUES ( #{discount_code}, #{member_id}, #{ac_code}, #{discount_cate}, #{discount_content}, NOW() )
